department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 4, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Government of Canada (GC), is issuing this Request for Information (RFI) to obtain industry feedback to establish a new method of supply for Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) and related services.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
===============

### RFI – Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment and Related Services

**Reference Number:** WS4271363241-Doc4272148566
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** WS4271363241
**Publication Date:** October 23, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** December 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
**Expected Contract End Date:** December 4, 2023

**Procurement Method:**
Competitive - Open Bidding

**Notice Type:** Request for Information

**Trade Agreements:**
The contracting authority reserves the right to apply trade agreements, which include:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
N/A

**Regions of Delivery:**
The contract will be delivered in the following regions:

* Manitoba
* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Prince Edward Island
* Saskatchewan
* Nova Scotia
* New Brunswick
* Yukon
* Northwest Territories
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Canada
* British Columbia
* Quebec (except NCR)
* Alberta

**Contracting Authority:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
	                    ....................................

**Point of Contact:**
Veronica Vallejo, SPAC/PSPC
veronica.vallejo@tppsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Please note that the contact information is provided in English only.

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17799159
